title: Refunds
body: Do you only get a certain amount of refunds per account? Are you able to earn any or, once you use them, that's it?

replies.body:
Refund tokens are mainly there for you to be able to issue an immediate refund for absolutely anything within the allowed time period. If something happens where you would need a refund that was out of your control, like someone hacked your account and spent money for example, then you can always reach out to our billing team to get that handled for you in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Make sure to double check our [**content refund FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864) beforehand!
